alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 7:16AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lemhi, southeastern Idaho and southwestern Ravalli Counties through 800 AM MDT... At 716 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 31 miles west of North Fork, or 36 miles west of Salmon, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conner, Sula, Lost Trail Pass and Shoup. This includes Highway 93 S near mile marker 0, and between mile markers 3 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County
